name: contacts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maytapi_whatsapp.
Tool description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via Maytapi. It is a stable and reliable solution. See more:  https://maytapi.com/
API description: Fetches the contacts list from a specified WhatsApp instance using the Maytapi API.

phone_id.description: The unique identifier for the phone instance in the Maytapi WhatsApp service.
